title: 이달의소녀탐구 #497 (LOONA TV #497)
members: HaSeul, OEC. Yves, Go Won, YeoJin
summary:
The MV shooting starts.
0:10 -- JinSoul, Choerry and Yves perform the OEC intro since Lip isn't present. Lip arrives: "What are you... DOING!"
0:20 -- They are currently standing by for their scene in the MV and are quite nervous. Yves and Lip were dancing in their dreams last night.
0:38 -- The four hear the announcement that they have 10 minutes left and they go to practice.
0:47 -- Go Won's Butterfly Wave. YeoJin and her mess around a while.
